00018 function                SetCookie( Name , Value , Expiredays , Path , Domain , Secure )
00019 {
00020       if( Expiredays )
00021       {
00022             var         Exdate = new Date();
00023             Exdate.setDate( Exdate.getDate() + Expiredays );
00024             var         Expires = Exdate.toGMTString();
00025       }
00026    
00027       document.cookie = Name + "=" + escape( Value ) +
00028       ( ( Expiredays ) ? "; expires=" + Expires : "" ) +
00029       ( ( Path ) ? "; path=" + Path : "" ) +
00030       ( ( Domain ) ? "; domain=" + Domain : "" ) +
00031       ( ( Secure ) ? "; secure" : "" );
00032 }

00045 function                GetCookie( Name , Default )
00046 {
00047       var               Cookie = " " + document.cookie;
00048       var         Search = " " + Name + "=";
00049       var         SetStr = Default;
00050       var         Offset = 0;
00051       var         End = 0;
00052       if( Cookie.length > 0 )
00053       {
00054             Offset = Cookie.indexOf( Search );
00055             if( Offset != -1 )
00056             {
00057                   Offset += Search.length;
00058                   End = Cookie.indexOf( ";" , Offset )
00059                   if( End == -1 )
00060                   {
00061                         End = Cookie.length;
00062                   }
00063                   SetStr = unescape( Cookie.substring( Offset , End ) );
00064             }
00065       }
00066       
00067       return( SetStr );
00068 }
